EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_CFPlatform_Q214.Invite 6
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Foundry Summit - Book 2 nights and receive a complimentary pass!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://cfsummit.com/> Hello! Over 500 people have registered already for his yearâ€™s Cloud Foundry Summit <http://cfsummit.com/> on June 9-11 in San Francisco! Register now to be a part of this year's premier event to share information, exchange ideas and influence the future direction of Open Platform-as-a-Service. You can go to the Summit for Free! We have extended the booking deadline to Friday, June 6. Book 2 nights <https://aws.passkey.com/g/24211375> or more at the conference hotel and you'll receive one free ticket to the Summit within 24 hours of confirming your reservation. Must complete by Friday June 6! Book your room today > <https://aws.passkey.com/g/24211375>> <https://aws.passkey.com/g/24211375>
Meet core contributors, fellow customers and Cloud Foundry Foundation members such as IBM, HP, NTT, and ActiveState to learn and share:
- New case studies from Monsanto, CoreLogic, Philips, Axel Springer & more
- Engineering roadmap - Technical architecture and implementation details - Hack Night - get hands on with Cloud Foundry
Check out the agenda >> <https://2014.event.cfsummit.com/schedule> We look forward to seeing you at the Summit! Team Cloud Foundry #cfsummit
